data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church in Champawat, Uttarakhand, India to make the most of every opportunity.
data.verse: Be very careful, then, how you live—not as unwise but as wise, making the most of every opportunity, because the days are evil.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Champawat, Uttarakhand, India
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the local leaders in Champawat, Uttarakhand, India to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the county of Champawat unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.
Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the county of Champawat, Uttarakhand, India.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Rajput Bachhal people.
Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the county of Champawat.
Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the county of Champawat, Uttarakhand, India.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the county of Champawat, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.
